product_overview: YouTube2PDF is a web application that transforms YouTube video content into actionable PDF summaries and study guides through AI-powered transcript extraction, summarization, and PDF generation. It targets users such as students, researchers, and professionals who seek an efficient way to digest video information.
core_goals: Enable automatic extraction of video transcripts from YouTube URLs.
Leverage OpenAI's advanced language models to generate concise and insightful summaries, key takeaways, and study notes from video transcripts.
Provide seamless PDF generation of formatted reports from processed video content for easy sharing and offline access.
Ensure secure user authentication and management via Supabase Auth.
Maintain cloud persistence of user data including generated reports, video history, and user profiles using Supabase Database.
Offer users a dashboard interface to manage generated reports and review their usage history with ease.
key_features: Video Transcription: Automatically fetch and parse transcripts from YouTube videos to create source content for processing.
AI-Powered Summaries: Utilize OpenAI APIs to generate meaningful and concise summaries and notes from transcripts.
PDF Generation: Convert markdown-based summaries into professionally formatted PDFs accessible via API endpoints.
User Authentication and Security: Implement secure sign-up and login flows using Supabase Auth to protect user data.
Cloud Data Storage: Persist user reports and video metadata in a Supabase database using Drizzle ORM for reliable storage and querying.
User Dashboard: Provide an intuitive dashboard for users to view, manage, and access all previously generated reports and video histories.
Streaming Summary Generation: Allow real-time streaming of AI summary generation to enhance user experience during report creation.
YouTube URL Report Generation Server Action: Extract transcripts from provided YouTube URLs, summarize content, and return PDFs in Base64 format for easy consumption.
user_flow_summary: User signs up or logs into the platform securely via Supabase Auth.
User inputs a YouTube video URL to start report generation.
System extracts the video transcript using youtubei.js and processes it through OpenAI to summarize key points.
The summarized information is formatted into markdown and sent to the PDF generation API endpoint to create a PDF report.
The generated PDF report is stored in the user's account in the Supabase database for future reference.
User accesses their dashboard to review, download, or manage all their generated reports and usage history.
During report creation, the user can see a live streaming view of the AI summary generation process for transparency and engagement.
validation_criteria: Successful extraction of transcripts from any valid public YouTube video URL.
Consistent generation of accurate and contextually relevant AI summaries from video transcript inputs.
PDF files generated must accurately reflect summarized content, be well-formatted, and downloadable.
Authentication workflows (sign-up, login, logout) must be secure and handle errors gracefully.
User reports and histories persist correctly in Supabase and can be retrieved reliably.
The user dashboard displays up-to-date reports and usage, reflecting recent actions without delay.
Streaming summary generation shows live progress without interruption or failure.
Server actions correctly produce valid Base64 encoded PDF reports from YouTube URLs as expected.
